item.title: Security 2 (ABC 407 C)
item.description: The Problem At the entrance of AtCoder Inc., there is a special pass-code input device. The device consists of a screen displaying one string, and two buttons. Let tt be the string shown on the screen. Initially, tt is the empty string. Pressing a button changes tt as follows: Pressing button A appends 0 to the end of tt. Pressing button B replaces every digit in tt with the next digit: for digits 0 through 8 the next digit is the one whose value is larger by 1; the next digit after 9 is 0.
